titles.title: Final Fantasy XV: Episode Ardyn - Prologue
FINAL FANTASY XV EPISODE ARDYN - PROLOGUE
Final Fantasy XV: Episode Ardyn - Prologue
Final Fantasy XV：王者之劍

anime.description: Final Fantasy XV: Episode Ardyn depicts the story of Ardyn Izunia, the main nemesis in FINAL FANTASY XV. The story of suffering, death, and resurrection leading up to the main story in FFXV. This animation reveals the story two millennia ago... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: Episode 1
